author: tng
msg: Add autodetection of MSVC++ version, and thus determine whether VC6 or VC7 project files should be used.   Patch from Robert Buck.

author: tng
msg: 390: Uniconv390 support.  Patch by Chris Larsson and Stephen Dulin.

author: tng
msg: 390: support record-oriented MVS datasets with the DOM Level 3 serialization APIs.  Patch by Chris Larsson and Stephen Dulin.

author: tng
msg: Got a number of compilation erros for those non-ANSI C++ compliant compiler like xlC v3.
Since the previous fix is just for fixing a "warning", I think it doesn't worth to break users who
are not ANSI C++ ready yet.
